name: Party Pirates
description:
Party Pirates

A party game, pirate ship, battle royal. Grab some friends, get your pirate ships, gather around the TV and battle each other to the death! 

Another University project. Challenged to make a party game that uses phone hardware capabilities. We decided to dive into the deep blue and make a pirate ship battle royal. Where you control your ship and canons with the gyroscope on your phone.

Year 2 - Third Term (Made in 3 weeks)

Team:

  • Artist: Kimiya Maghsoodi (Concertizing, 2D Art & UI Design)
  • Artist: Liam van Asten (Game Design & 3D Art)
  • Designer: Tal Aviv (Map Design & Presentations)
  • Designer: Yoan Nikolov (Sound Design & Game Design)
  • Engineer: Arjen van Klaveren (Mechanics & Control system)
  • Engineer: Jenoah Kers (Mechanics & Networking)
